Name: Perfume Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
POUR all ingredients into shaker and STIR to incorporate honey.
Garnish with mint leaf floated on the cocktail or pegged to the rim.
History: The Argentinean Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by Ezequiel Rodríguez at Victoria Brown Bar in Buenos Aires.
